pinyin: chong2 fu4 shi3 li4 shang1 hai4

sentences.english: This study is significant for generation of ultra-short optical pulse chain at high repetition rate.
sentences.chinese: 該研究對高重複率脈衝串產生具有一定意義。

sentences.english: Other ideas include encouraging guests to reuse towels and linens.
sentences.chinese: 其他措施包括鼓勵客人重複使用毛巾和牀單。

sentences.english: The exercises should cause exhaustion after the total repetitions are completed.
sentences.chinese: 這種鍛鍊在所有的重複完畢後應該使自己精疲力盡。

sentences.english: Repeat this procedure until every pattern piece has been individually traced-off.
sentences.chinese: 重複這道程序，直到每一張衣片紙樣獨立描下。

sentences.english: To avoid duplication, please do not mail faxed order form.
sentences.chinese: 已傳真表格，毋須再郵寄，以免重複。

sentences.english: The water and the organic compound can be reused.
sentences.chinese: 水和有機化合物可以被重複利用。

sentences.english: He repeated the word several times.
sentences.chinese: 他把那個詞重複了幾遍。

sentences.english: That process can repeat over and over, so the cells rarely need replacing.
sentences.chinese: 這個過程可以不斷的重複，所以電池幾乎不需要更換。

sentences.english: These repetitive and necessary alterations can only be realized by the original designer.
sentences.chinese: 這些重複但必要的改動只能由原設計師來實現。

sentences.english: Should the disinfected needle dry out before re-using it?
sentences.chinese: 是否應該在針具消毒晾乾後再重複使用？

sentences.english: Repeat this process, to keep your inboxes empty .
sentences.chinese: 重複這些步驟，保持你的收件箱爲空。

sentences.english: The true feelings reveal, here two are redundant is how could it not be more moving? Also for example.
sentences.chinese: 真情流露，這裏的兩個重複豈不更令人感動？又如。

sentences.english: These two steps repeat recursively and depth first.
sentences.chinese: 這兩步遞歸地以深度優先的方式重複。

sentences.english: Totally 99 repeated articles were deleted and 22 were reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 排除99篇重複文獻，納入22篇用於綜述。

sentences.english: OCD patients feel compelled to repeat behaviours such as washing their hands.
sentences.chinese: 強迫症患者倍感強迫來重複一系列行爲，如重複洗手。

sentences.english: OCD patients feel compelled to repeat behaviours such as washing their hands.
sentences.chinese: 強迫症患者倍感強迫來重複一系列行爲，如重複洗手。

definition: variant of 反覆|反复[fan3 fu4]
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
to overlap/to superimpose/to telescope/to run together/to duplicate/one over another/superposition/an overlap/redundancy/reduplication (in Chinese grammar, e.g. 散散步[san4 san4 bu4] to have a stroll)
